genitive.masc hard: For masculine nouns ending in a consonant (except й), add а
genitive.masc soft: For masculine nouns ending in й or ь, replace with я or sometimes ю
genitive.masc hard exception: Some masculine nouns ending in a consonant are exceptions, add у
genitive.fem hard: For feminine nouns ending in а, replace with и
genitive.fem soft: For feminine nouns ending in я or ь, replace with і
genitive.fem ія: For feminine nouns ending in ія, replace with ії
genitive.fem consonant: For feminine nouns ending in a consonant, add і
genitive.neu hard: For neuter nouns ending in о, replace with а
genitive.neu soft: For neuter nouns ending in е, replace with я
genitive.neu я: For neuter nouns ending in я, no change

accusative.masc inanimate: For inanimate masculine nouns, no change
accusative.masc hard animate: For animate masculine nouns ending in a consonant (except й), add а
accusative.masc soft animate: For animate masculine nouns ending in й or ь, replace with я
accusative.fem hard: For feminine nouns ending in а, replace with у
accusative.fem soft: For feminine nouns ending in я, replace with ю
accusative.fem consonant/ь: For feminine nouns ending in a consonant or ь, no change
accusative.neu: For neuter nouns ending in о, е, or я, no change

dative.masc hard: For masculine nouns ending in a consonant (except й), add у (or ові)
dative.masc й: For masculine nouns ending in й, replace with ю (or єві)
dative.masc ь: For masculine nouns ending in ь, replace with ю (or еві)
dative.fem: For feminine nouns ending in а, я, ь, replace with і
dative.fem consonant: For feminine nouns ending in a consonant, add і
dative.neu hard: For neuter nouns ending in о, replace with у
dative.neu soft: For neuter nouns ending in е or я, replace with ю

instrumental.masc hard: For masculine nouns ending in a consonant (except й), add ом
instrumental.masc й: For masculine nouns ending in й, replace with єм
instrumental.masc ь: For masculine nouns ending in ь, replace with ем
instrumental.fem hard: For feminine nouns ending in а, replace with ою
instrumental.fem soft: For feminine nouns ending in я, replace with ею
instrumental.fem ія: For feminine nouns ending in ія, replace with єю
instrumental.fem ь: For feminine nouns ending in ь, replace with ю (some nouns will also double the consonant)
instrumental.fem consonant: For nouns ending in a consonant, double the consonant and add ю
instrumental.neu: For neuter nouns ending in о, е, or я, add м

locative.masc hard: For masculine nouns ending in a consonant (except й, к, or г), add і
locative.masc к/г: For masculine nouns ending in к or г, add у
locative.masc й: For masculine nouns ending in й, replace with ї or sometimes ю
locative.masc ь: For masculine nouns ending in ь, replace with і
locative.fem: For feminine nouns ending in а, я or і, replace with і
locative.fem ія: For feminine nouns ending in ія, replace with ії
locative.fem consonant: For feminine nouns ending in a consonant, add і
locative.neu: For neuter nouns ending in о, е, or я, replace with і

vocative.masc hard: For masculine nouns ending in a consonant (except ч, ш, or й), add е
vocative.masc ч/ш: For masculine nouns ending in ч or ш, add у
vocative.masc soft: For masculine nouns ending in ь or й, replace with ю
vocative.fem hard: For feminine nouns ending in а, replace with о
vocative.fem soft: For feminine nouns ending in я, replace with е
vocative.fem ія: For feminine nouns ending in ія, replace with іє

nominative.masc hard: For masculine nouns ending in a consonant (except for ж, ч, ш, щ or й), add и
nominative.masc ь: For masculine nouns ending in ь, replace with і
nominative.masc ж/ч/ш/щ: For masculine nouns ending in ж, ч, ш, or щ, add і
nominative.masc ар/яр: For masculine nouns ending in ар or яр, add і
nominative.masc й: For masculine nouns ending in й, replace with ї
nominative.друг exception: This word is an exception, replace г with зі
nominative.fem hard: For feminine nouns ending in а, replace with и
nominative.fem soft: For feminine nouns ending in я, replace with і
nominative.fem жа/ча/ша/ща: For feminine nouns ending in жа, ча, ша, or ща, replace а with і
nominative.fem 'я: For feminine nouns ending in 'я, replace with ї
nominative.fem ія: For feminine nouns ending in ія, replace with ії
nominative.neu hard: For neuter nouns ending in о, replace with а
nominative.neu soft: For neuter nouns ending in е, replace with я
nominative.neu же/че/ше/ще: For neuter nouns ending in же, че, ше, or ще, replace е with а
nominative.neu я: For neuter nouns ending in я, no change

genitive.masc hard: For masculine nouns ending in a consonant, add ів
genitive.masc soft: For masculine nouns ending in ь, й, or я, replace with ів
genitive.друг exception: This word is an exception, replace г with зів
genitive.fem hard: For feminine nouns ending in а, remove а
genitive.fem ка: For feminine nouns ending in ка, replace with ок
genitive.fem я: For feminine nouns ending in я, replace with ь
genitive.fem ь: For feminine nouns ending in ь, no change
genitive.fem consonant: For feminine nouns ending in a consonant, add ей
genitive.fem жа/ча/ша/ща: For feminine nouns ending in жа, ча, ша, or ща, replace а with ей
genitive.neu hard: For neuter nouns ending in о, remove о
genitive.neu soft: For neuter nouns ending in е, replace with ь

accusative.masc inanimate: For masculine inanimate nouns, the accusative plural is the same as the nominative plural
accusative.masc animate: For masculine animate nouns, the accusative plural is the same as the genitive plural
accusative.fem inanimate: For feminine inanimate nouns, the accusative plural is the same as the nominative plural
accusative.fem animate: For feminine animate nouns, the accusative plural is the same as the genitive plural
accusative.neu: For neuter nouns, the accusative plural is the same as the nominative plural

dative.masc hard: For masculine nouns ending in a consonant, add ам
dative.masc soft: For masculine nouns ending in й or ь, replace with ям
dative.друг exception: This word is an exception, replace г with зям
dative.fem hard: For feminine nouns ending in а, replace with ам
dative.fem soft: For feminine nouns ending in я, replace with ям
dative.neu hard: For neuter nouns ending in о, replace with ам
dative.neu soft: For neuter nouns ending in е, replace with ям

instrumental.masc hard: For masculine nouns ending in a consonant, add ами
instrumental.masc soft: For masculine nouns ending in й or ь, replace with ями
instrumental.друг exception: This word is an exception, replace г with зями
instrumental.fem hard: For feminine nouns ending in а, replace with ами
instrumental.fem soft: For feminine nouns ending in ь or я, replace with ями
instrumental.fem consonant: For feminine nouns ending in a consonant, add ами
instrumental.neu hard: For neuter nouns ending in о, replace with ами
instrumental.neu soft: For neuter nouns ending in е, replace with ями

locative.masc hard: For masculine nouns ending in a consonant, add ах
locative.masc soft: For masculine nouns ending in й or ь, replace with ях
locative.друг exception: This word is an exception, replace г with зях
locative.fem hard: For feminine nouns ending in а, replace with ах
locative.fem soft: For feminine nouns ending in я, replace with ях
locative.fem consonant: For feminine nouns ending in a consonant, add ах
locative.neu hard: For neuter nouns ending in о, replace with ах
locative.neu soft: For neuter nouns ending in е, replace with ях
